news.title: UK to purchase nuclear-carrying F-35A fighter jets
news.summary: Downing Street says the move is "the biggest strengthening of the UK's nuclear posture in a generation".

news.title: Eurostar passengers face severe delays and cancellations after cable theft
news.summary: Passengers are being told to cancel or postpone their trips, following two track deaths and the theft of copper cables.

news.title: Smashed windscreens and knife threats: We're living in fear of our neighbours
news.summary: People contacted the BBC about relentless noise, vandalism, death threats and physical assaults by neighbours.

news.title: British man charged over mock Disneyland wedding to child had been investigated by BBC
news.summary: Jacky Jhaj, a convicted paedophile, has staged several elaborate productions involving children and young people since he was released from prison.

news.title: Left-wing Democrat stuns former governor in NY mayor primary
news.summary: The 33-year-old democratic socialist would be the first Muslim to lead the nation's largest city if elected.

news.title: UK to host Trump for full state visit later this year
news.summary: The dates of the US president's stay are yet to be confirmed, but September is said to be most likely.

news.title: More people buying electric cars and heat pumps than ever before
news.summary: But the Climate Change Committee warns there's still a long way to go for the UK to reach net zero by 2050.

news.title: I lost Â£15,000 after going to an IVF middleman
news.summary: Companies that act as "middlemen" between patients and doctors are not regulated by the fertility watchdog.

news.title: US strikes did not destroy Iran nuclear programme, says intelligence assessment
news.summary: The White House called the initial damage evaluation on Iran's uranium stockpile "flat-out wrong".

news.title: Rod Stewart on Glastonbury: 'I wish they wouldn't call it the tea time slot'
news.summary: The rock star talks to BBC News ahead of his performance at the Glastonbury Festival this weekend.
